subject: Delete existing fibonacci implementation and tests
description:
Remove the existing fibonacci implementation completely:
1. Delete `src/utils/fibonacci.ts`
2. Remove the barrel export from `src/utils/index.ts` (the line `export * from "./fibonacci.js";`)
3. Delete `tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts`
4. Verify the deletion doesn't break any other imports (check findings from task 1)
5. Run `bun run typecheck` to ensure no broken references remain
6. Commit: `refactor: remove existing fibonacci implementation`

IMPORTANT: This is the TDD RED phase - after deletion, the old tests should not exist. We delete implementation AND tests together since we're replacing both.

acceptance_criteria: typecheck passes with no fibonacci references
learnings: Pre-commit hooks committed additional staged files beyond the intended fibonacci changes - always check git status before staging to avoid unintended inclusions

verification.command: ! ls src/utils/fibonacci.ts 2>/dev/null && ! ls tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts 2>/dev/null && echo 'Files deleted'
